product_name: Big Agnes King Solomon Sleeping Bag - Double
long_description: Sleep like royalty in this lightweight double-wide down sleeping bag for 2. Its Insotect Flow Construction offers superior heat distribution and lofty comfort for your 3-season backpacking getaways.
